item0.name: Everfrost
item0.description:
80 Ability Power
200 Health
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste

Active - Glaciate: Deal (100 + 30% Ability Power) magic damage in a cone, Slowing enemies by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies at the center of the cone are Rooted instead (20s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

item1.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item1.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item2.name: Doran's Ring
item2.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item4.name: Dark Seal
item4.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item5.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item5.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Arcane Comet
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

item1.name: Broken Stopwatch
item1.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

75 Health
100% Base Mana Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item1.name: Mikael's Blessing
item1.description:
20% Heal and Shield Power
50 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Purify: Remove all crowd control debuffs (except Knockups and Suppression) from an ally champion and restore 100 - 200 (based on ally level) Health (120s cooldown).

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Bandleglass Mirror
item3.description:
20 Ability Power
10 Ability Haste
50% Base Mana Regen

item5.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item5.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Summon Aery
perk0.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

item0.name: Refillable Potion
item0.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item1.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item1.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item2.name: Moonstone Renewer
item2.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 70 - 100 (based on ally level) Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases this healing effect by 12.5% (to a maximum of 50%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

perk0.name: Guardian
perk0.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

item1.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Inspire: Grants you and nearby allies 60% decaying Move Speed for 4 seconds. Champions gain an additional 35 - 55 (based on ally level) magic damage on the next 3 Attacks or Ability hits against champions (90s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2.5% Move Speed.

Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.
